Room.Name: The Temple of Ahto Meditation Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a very secret meditation chamber where the priests of Ahto come to talk with Ahto himself, to gain advice and knowledge about the ocean.
Room.LongDescription: The Meditation Chamber is strictly off limits to all outsiders except the priests and priestesses of Ahto, who will attack you if you stay in here too long. In addition, the powerful presence of the god Ahto himself will sometimes be present.
